metadata.title: USN-3966-1 -- GNOME Shell vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the GNOME Shell incorrectly handled certain keyboard inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to invoke keyboard shortcuts, and potentially other actions while the workstation was locked.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3966-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gnome-shell - 3.28.3+git20190124-0ubuntu18.04.2 gnome-shell-common - 3.28.3+git20190124-0ubuntu18.04.2 No subscription required
